Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-49948 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.173.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-49948 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.173.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
